name: Ocean Ambience
description:
This is a non-interactive version of my sailing game that simply allows you to view the world from several different cameras. Makes a nice background visual / audio thing and is running the whole game so would also serve as a good benchmark.

Has a day/night cycle, some fish, and you may even see some NPC ships sailing around in the distance. : )

Controls:

  • 1: Flythrough Camera
  • 2: Static Camera

No built in quit controls, use your preferred OS method.
